title: The Boss's Daughter
description:
“Your only collateral is your body, so I have to check it thoroughly.”
Nam Dohyun is a loan collector who's loyal to the organization he works for, indulging himself by fucking the women in debt. But, he hopes to get his life back on track and live a normal life. Just as he begins to dream of a modest future with a good woman he met, he’s suddenly framed for a crime he didn't commit. He loses everything and is left to die by the hands of his boss... "Even if I die, I want to take the boss down with me!".
author: Park Daeman
